PersonalStatement.text: Michelle Sharp, born on 1974-01-25, is a Male based in Lake Markbury, Malaysia. He is Divorced and holds Nepalese nationality. Currently working at Kennedy Group.

WorkExperience.text: Project Manager at Koch-Moore from 2013 to 2020.
Senior Data Analyst at Kennedy Group, 2022 to present.

PersonalSkills.text: Leadership: Proven track record of managing cross-functional teams.
